ygData.subject: xp at 24?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m trying to figure out where to get xp at 24th level.  I really like Upper Guk, but there is kind of a hole at 24th level in Upper Guk.  My friends all want
ygData.messageBody:
I'm trying to figure out where to get xp at 24th level. I really like
Upper Guk, but there is kind of a hole at 24th level in Upper Guk. My
friends all want to do Cazic Thule, but I find it so incredibly
boring. I was thinking Unrest, but I have so many bad memories of
such bad trains there. Seems like Runnyeye might be good, but not too
familiar with it. Not sure what levels of creatures are there. Then
there is Borxx who could probably kick our ass.
Friend of mine suggested East Karana might be a good place to solo.
Said I could solo evil eyes there. And as risky/exciting as that
sounds, I don't think I could continue to get xp there until 29th.
Paw and Mistmoore are still too high/tough. I heard Sol A might be
good, but I've never been to Lavastorm, and worry about falling into
lava as I've heard you're oft to do when zoning into the place. Maybe
dark elf guards in Nektulos? What level are griffons? What level are
the giant skels in Rathe mountains? Maybe pickclaws in highkeep?

Anyone have any recommendations for either a group of low 20s, or for
me to solo at 24?

Thanks in advance,
Ergo Soulhealer
test server
